item.title: grok-log-aws-2
item.description: As I studied an open-source codebase with intent to contribute, I used ChatGPT as a note-taking tool. This is my side of one of our conversations. how does “git push aws master:master” work at the end? async function deploy() { const BUMP_FLAGS = { PATCH: '--patch', MINOR: '--minor', MAJOR: '--major', }; const bump = BUMP.getOrDefault('PATCH'); const branch = BRANCH.getOrDefault('master'); const remote = REMOTE.getOrDefault('aws'); if (!(bump in BUMP_FLAGS)) { throw new TypeError(BUMP must be one of: ${Object.
